message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't exceed $12,000 for it. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I can't go as low as $12,000 but I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal!
